document_data.name: Torgent
document_data.mainbody: '''Torgent''' was a guard at the [[Waterdeep]] palace in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was gray-haired and gray-moustached, and not as bulky as he'd once been.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1355}}, Torgent was guarding a passage from the home of [[Shyrrhr]] to the Palace of [[Waterdeep]] when Mirt tried to enter with [[Asper]]. Mirt was allowed to pass, and asked for the location of [[Piergeiron Paladinson]], to which Torgent replied by warning him the Open Lord was not himself lately, and had taken up his full armor and helm in the [[Inner Audience Chamber]].
